entry.value: select b.typename,a.*,c.paramsname as materialname,d.paramsname as unitname, (ifnull((select sum(sl.sum) from order_material_store_list sl where sl.materialid=a.id and sl.updttime>='{0}' and sl.updttime<'{1}'),0)+ifnull((select initsum from material_store_list where storedate='{2}' and id=a.id),0)) as input, (ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.consumetype='1' and ool.checkyn='1' and fm.footid=ool.goodsid and fm.materialid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}' ),0)) as output, (ifnull((select sum(omsl.sum) from order_material_store_list omsl where omsl.materialid=a.id and omsl.updttime>='{0}' and omsl.updttime<'{1}'),0) +ifnull((select msl.initsum from material_store_list msl where msl.storedate='{2}' and msl.id=a.id),0) -(ifnull((select sum(ol.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_list ol,foot_material fm where ol.consumetype='1' and ol.checkyn='1' and fm.footid=ol.goodsid and fm.materialid=a.id and fm.issecond='0' and ol.updttime>='{0}' and ol.updttime<'{1}' ),0)) -(ifnull((select sum(osml.sum) from order_second_material_list osml where osml.materialid=a.id and osml.updttime>='{0}' and osml.updttime<'{1}'),0))) as sum from material_store_list a, material_type b,material_list c,params_list d where a.typeid=b.id and a.id=c.id and c.unit=d.paramscode and d.typeid='UNIT' and c.typeid='{3}' and a.storedate='{4}'

select b.typename,a.*,c.paramsname as materialname,d.paramsname as unitname,c.cost as cost, ifnull((select sum(msl.initsum) from material_store_list msl where msl.id=a.id and msl.storedate='{2}'),0) as monthinit, (ifnull((select sum(sl.sum) from order_material_store_list sl where sl.materialid=a.id and sl.updttime>='{0}' and sl.updttime<'{1}'),0)) as input, (ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.consumetype='1' and ool.checkyn='1' and fm.footid=ool.goodsid and fm.materialid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}' and fm.issecond='0' ),0)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_list osm where osm.materialid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0)) as output, ((ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.consumetype='1' and ool.checkyn='1' and fm.footid=ool.goodsid and fm.materialid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}' and fm.issecond='0' ),0)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_list osm where osm.materialid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0))*c.cost) as spend, (ifnull((select sum(omsl.sum) from order_material_store_list omsl where omsl.materialid=a.id and omsl.updttime>='{0}' and omsl.updttime<'{1}'),0) +ifnull((select msl.initsum from material_store_list msl where msl.storedate='{2}' and msl.id=a.id),0) -(ifnull((select sum(ol.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_list ol,foot_material fm where ol.consumetype='1' and ol.checkyn='1' and fm.footid=ol.goodsid and fm.materialid=a.id and fm.issecond='0' and ol.updttime>='{0}' and ol.updttime<'{1}' ),0)) -(ifnull((select sum(osml.sum) from order_second_material_list osml where osml.materialid=a.id and osml.updttime>='{0}' and osml.updttime<'{1}'),0))) as sum, (ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_back_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.goodsid=fm.footid and fm.materialid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}' and fm.issecond='0'),0)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_back_list osm where osm.materialid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}' ),0)) as losssum, (ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_back_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.goodsid=fm.footid and fm.materialid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}' and fm.issecond='0'),0)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_back_list osm where osm.materialid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0))*c.cost as losscostsum from material_store_list a, material_type b,material_list c,params_list d where a.typeid=b.id and a.id=c.id and c.unit=d.paramscode and d.typeid='UNIT' and a.storedate='{3}' {4}

select a.paramsname as footname,c.paramsname as materialname,c.cost as materialcost,d.paramsname as unitname, ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber) from order_output_list ool where ool.goodsid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}'),0) as sellamount, ifnull((select sum(ool.actuallypay) from order_output_list ool where ool.goodsid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}'),0) as sellpay, b.amount as materialamount, ((ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber) from order_output_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.goodsid=fm.footid and fm.materialid=b.materialid and fm.issecond='0' and ool.goodsid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}'),0)*b.amount)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_list osm where osm.materialid=b.materialid and osm.goodsid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0)) as materialsum, ((ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber) from order_output_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.goodsid=fm.footid and fm.materialid=b.materialid and fm.issecond='0' and ool.goodsid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}'),0)*b.amount)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_list osm where osm.materialid=b.materialid and osm.goodsid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0))*c.cost as materialcostsum, ((ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber) from order_output_back_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.goodsid=fm.footid and fm.materialid=b.materialid and fm.issecond='0' and ool.goodsid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}'),0))+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_back_list osm where osm.materialid=b.materialid and osm.goodsid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0)) as lossamount, ((ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber) from order_output_back_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.goodsid=fm.footid and fm.materialid=b.materialid and fm.issecond='0' and ool.goodsid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}'),0)*b.amount)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_back_list osm where osm.materialid=b.materialid and osm.goodsid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0)) as lossmaterialsum, ((ifnull((select sum(ool.goodsnumber) from order_output_back_list ool,foot_material fm where ool.goodsid=fm.footid and fm.materialid=b.materialid and fm.issecond='0' and ool.goodsid=a.id and ool.updttime>='{0}' and ool.updttime<'{1}'),0)*b.amount)+ifnull((select sum(osm.sum) from order_second_material_back_list osm where osm.materialid=b.materialid and osm.goodsid=a.id and osm.updttime>='{0}' and osm.updttime<'{1}'),0))*c.cost as lossmaterialcostsum,
ifnull((select sum(msl.initsum) from material_store_list msl where msl.id=b.materialid and msl.storedate='{2}'),0) as monthinit, (ifnull((select sum(sl.sum) from order_material_store_list sl where sl.materialid=b.materialid and sl.updttime>='{0}' and sl.updttime<'{1}'),0)) as monthinput, ifnull((select sum(msl.initsum) from material_store_list msl where msl.id=b.materialid and msl.storedate='{3}'),0) as monthend, (ifnull((select sum(msl.initsum) from material_store_list msl where msl.id=b.materialid and msl.storedate='{2}'),0) +ifnull((select sum(sl.sum) from order_material_store_list sl where sl.materialid=b.materialid and sl.updttime>='{0}' and sl.updttime<'{1}'),0) -ifnull((select sum(ol.goodsnumber*fm.amount) from order_output_list ol,foot_material fm where ol.consumetype='1' and ol.checkyn='1' and fm.footid=ol.goodsid and fm.materialid=b.materialid and fm.issecond='0' and ol.updttime>='{0}' and ol.updttime<'{1}' ),0) -ifnull((select sum(osml.sum) from order_second_material_list osml where osml.materialid=b.materialid and osml.updttime>='{0}' and osml.updttime<'{1}'),0)) as monthshouldend from foot_list a,foot_material b,material_list c,params_list d where a.id=b.footid and b.materialid=c.id and c.unit=d.paramscode and d.typeid='UNIT' {4} order by a.paramsname

select new map(a.id as id, a.cardid as cardid, a.password as password,a.username as username,a.moblie as moblie,a.otherdesc as otherdesc,a.idcard as idcard,a.materialid as materialid,a.state as state,a.day as day,a.overtime as overtime,a.cash as cash,a.updtuser as updtuser,a.updttime as updttime,b.userName as updtusername,c.paramsname as materialname,d.paramsname as statename) from KtvStayInfo a, UserInfo b,MaterialListKtv c,ParamsList d where a.state=d.paramscode and d.typeid='KTV_STATE' and c.id=a.materialid and a.updtuser=b.userId order by a.updttime desc
